RelatedSentence: Investigators said Victor Navarro , 24 , walked into 41 HealthMart , 820 E. 41 st St. , around 12:15 p.m. demanding Xanax .
Investigators said Victor Navarro , 24 , walked into 41 HealthMart , 820 E. 41 st St. , around 12:15 p.m. demanding Xanax .
Navarro left and came back , lifting up his shirt to show a weapon , which turned out to be a BB gun .
A pharmacy employee fatally shot Navarro , who investigators said had a serious drug problem .
